step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position with your arm stretched overhead and fingers open.
You maintained good form by keeping your arm overhead and fingers open.
You made a good fist while pushing down, squeezing your shoulder blades together and inhaling.
You stretched your arms back overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
You maintained good form throughout this step.
You started the second repetition well, maintaining a comfortable position with your arm overhead and fingers open.
Your arm remained overhead and fingers open, showing good control.
You successfully made a fist, pushed down, squeezed your shoulder blades, and inhaled.
You completed the movement by stretching arms overhead while exhaling and relaxing.
You maintained good form throughout this final step.

exercise_summary: Great job completing the Push Down Pumping exercise! You consistently followed the instructions to stretch your arms overhead, make a fist while squeezing your shoulder blades, and then relax. Keep up the excellent work with your lymphatic drainage exercises.
